com.ikalagaming.plugins

Class MiscLoggingListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.plugins.MiscLoggingListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listener

    class MiscLoggingListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements Listener
    The event listener for the plugin management system.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Constructor Detail

      • MiscLoggingListener

        MiscLoggingListener()

    • Method Detail

      • onLogEvent

        public void onLogEvent(Log log)
        Logs the provided information. Attempts to use localized names for the logging level. This only logs information that is above or equal to the logging threshold.
        If the plugin is not enabled, simply logs straight to System.out
        Parameters:
        log - the Event to record

      • onPluginLoaded

        public void onPluginLoaded(PluginLoaded event)
        If plugins should be enabled on load, this enables the newly loaded plugin. Also logs the plugin being loaded.
        Parameters:
        event - the event that was received

      • logAlert

        void logAlert(java.lang.String whichAlert,
              Plugin plugin)
        Log an alert about a plugin lifecycle, where plugin name and version are automatically replaced.
        Parameters:
        whichAlert - The string to read from the resource bundle
        plugin - The plugin that the alert is about

      • onPluginDisabled

        public void onPluginDisabled(PluginDisabled event)
        Logs the plugin being disabled.
        Parameters:
        event - the event that was received

      • onPluginEnabled

        public void onPluginEnabled(PluginEnabled event)
        Logs the plugin being enabled.
        Parameters:
        event - the event that was received
